Catfish are extremely skilled in making you believe those bad experiences really happened. Death, illness, family trouble, it's all a big part of them keeping their lies straight and getting you to empathize and not challenge them. There are simple things you can do.... check the location and look for an obituary online, if there isn't one, you were probably catfished.

I'm only stupid not dead, no worries all! #128522;

I tell myself I'm not really an addict all the time. I rarely miss work and very few people know I use. I have done terrible things for drugs but currently am not, so I lie to myself. I tell myself I'm not that bad. But ANYTIME I go through even a little wd symptoms, I'm a crabby ass bitch who is CLEARLY very addicted to opiates. Keeping my job doesn't make me not an addict, unfortunately.

I guess what i meant morseo is that I don't do anyhting in my mind "morally wrong" for my drugs so it seems "less of a problem" to me and I can tell myself I'm not that deep because of it. Even though realistically I'm addicted physically and mentally to some degree.

I knew I'd be in Canada for 2 hours. If I was STAYING in Canada, I'd have had drugs in my vagina. But I KNEW you'd have something for me on the other side. That has absolutely no correlation to how addicted I am, only how smart I am. And not bringing ANYTHING into Canada considering they DID search me was really fucking smart on my part. It's not what I wanted as an addict, just the smarter of the two choices.

There is seldom an interesting or different reason than they aren't comfortable with their body image. It seems you already know why this person did what they did, so if you don't want closure I'd say fuck this and move on. If you don't need closure, why bother with any of this? You don't need closure so none of it actually matters. Good luck finding whatever it is you are looking for though

WRITING.TITLE: My catfush who was revealed just a few months ago phoned me this evening
WRITING.TEXT: Preface: i was catfished for a year and a half. I met a man on Tumblr and after some time I found out that he was not who he said he was. I have hit rock bottom before where I had nowhere to stay, very little clothes, a cell phone that I rarely could actually pay off each month so I was reliant on wireless internet. Because of this experience, when I met someone else going through the same struggles, I was in a very vulnerable position and it was very easy for me to believe that he would not lie about having some of the issues he did. Little did I know that is a common tactic for catfish to use. A user here from Reddit helped me in finding my catfish and understanding why these people sometimes do what they do. In a sense I was able to forgive my catfish. It was absolutely not all forgiven, but talking to someone who has experience as a catfish, it made it easier for me to put myself in my cat catfish's shoes and understand why he may have done what he did. He and I spoke a few times after he was found out and admitted to me what he had done. We were not exactly friends, but I did not want to kick this man out of my life because I felt sympathy for him and because we did have a connection, I felt at the time. For a short time he and I were friends, but it didn't take long for me to realize that he was using more manipulation tactics to keep me as a friend. He got me again. I told him that the pity he often gave himself, by always telling me how sorry he was when really we had moved on, showed me that he really wanted my affection in a different way still, and that he didn't really want to accept just friendship. We stopped talking and I felt a lot better. Just tonight my phone rang. I don't usually answer phone calls from numbers I don't know but this was my area code so I actually picked it up. It was my catfish. He called me to tell me how he couldn't live without me anymore, that the pain was too real. He said he didn't want to do it anymore and threatened to kill himself on the phone with me. Although this is not his first suicide threat to me, it made me so upset. I was sobbing uncontrollably and totally bought into it. I feel so ridiculous for having fallen for something so many times. But at the same time I start to wonder, how sick is this person and how does no one around him see it? I still have pity for this person... After everything, and now he leaves me sobbing crying on the phone and hangs up on me; last words saying goodbye in a manner he knows I am taking as a permanent goodbye to life. It's amazing how long some of these people will continue to fuck with someone. I would loke to think I have learmed a lot from this, and I truly did. But it honestly does bother me that I let this man even phase me again. Before y'all say it, I'm calling verizon and requesting they block calls amd texts from him number. He is already blocked on the other few sociak networks he has. But amyway, that should be the end of it. Should be. He's gone to excessive lengths to contact me thus far but blocking him verizon will hopefully take care of this, finally. Him calling me amd threatenung something so serious just really upset me and I needed to get it off my chest.

WRITING.TITLE: Finallllllly
WRITING.TEXT: Today I went to take my dealer's wife and son so we could all go see her daughter in jail and my dealer informed me he had what I've been hunting for years.... Opana!!! I got two 30mg G77 brown opanas and I am so super fucking happy. Wasn't even looking for them and they just showed up.... what a day! Edit: Question for experienced opana users: bioavailability wise.... if I want the highest percentage, what do I do, between snort or swallow?
I couldn't believe it. I've never ever come across them in my area, don't even personally know someone from here who has! It was like finding lost treasure lol
I've never seen opana in real life either! It was an awesome surprise.
I've never even heard of these being in my area!!! To me, this is like my own JJ experience!
Do you use opana often? I use 120mg oxy most days. Do you have a suggestion how many mgs I should start with?

Perfect. This is abdolutely the answer I was looking for. Thanks SO much! I know the bioavailability for oxy is higher orally so I am always skeptical when people say smort cause everyone seems to snort oxy. This is the exact answer I was looking for, thank you again!

Thank you so much. I feel so stupid for feeling bad. The whole thing just messes me up. I know he is a heavy drug user, or am fairly certain anyhow, so part of me he gets messed up and tries to find ways to contact me? He has left me alone for some time now.... and I don't hate him. So no matter what, the idea of him hurting himself will always hurt me, as i would never wish that upon anyone. Thank you for everything you've done with talking with me to help understand and get through my situation more. It truly has been so much help.
Thank you so much for the advice!
Thanks :) hopefully something good comes your way soon!

Thank you. You're right. This isn't my fault he lied. It can't be. I can't let myself hurt over that. I just cared for this person and it is not on me for caring but him for lying. But also he is great at manipulating me. He is likely not planning to actually hurt himself. He is merely crying wolf for the umpteenth time. At least i think i finally know how to completely block him and avoid him all together. That is relieving for me at least.
Thanks so much, I'll be extremely careful
When there's a will, there's a way lol
I'm going to snort a chunk of it tonight after work. Yesterday when zi came across it I'd already ingested enough drugs for a day. But I'll get to give it a try later!
Awesomme, thanks for the advice! I'll be snorting half of one tinight after work.

I couldn't take it last night because I had done a little xan and other opiates already when I had come across these and because idk how much of this I can handle yet, I waited. I will be snorting half a pill after I get off work tonight and I'll update on how I like it!

I know not to take suicide lightly, and thank you so much for understanding why I would not buy it, by you saying you don't either. It feels like a horrible thing to say.... but you're right. He is likely only using this to manipulate me and I am not a bad person for not feeding into it anymore. Thank you

Thank you. It helps to read that I am not wrong for now ignoring these threats. It definitely somewhat feels wrong but a little reassurance from others that I need to pay no mind to this and move on really does help me not feel so bad about this.
You cannot nod off kratom.

I believe it does. I use opiates daily and have a moderate tolerance to them. Personally, I can take 4 or 5 grams of tolerance and avoid withdrawal. But I do not get any feelings of euphoria or any type of "high" really. For most opiates users with any tolerance, it will only work to stop some withdrawal symptoms.

honestly..... your car probably still reeked. lol. when you smoke, your nose doesn't pick the smell up the way it should. I wouldn't rely on this method. or any method. only way to make your car not smell is by not smoking in it unfortunately. weed is just too smelly. any decent weed at least lol

this works for me every time: put a lot of water in your mouth. hold your breath and plug your ears. slowly swallow little sips of the water in your mouth and hold your breath as long as you can. good luck OP. I get hiccups from opiate use, also never heard of it happening to anyone else but I get them alllll the timeeeee and this always does trick for me!

People view me as an innocent young lady. That's what I appear as. I think I am respected in my community as most people tell me they are completely shocked when they find out I am an opiate addict. I got started by taking the pain killers prescribed to me by my doctor for a few different things; ovarian cysts, gum infection and wisdom teeth removal. I was 21 when all those things occurred. Now at 25, I use opiates daily and only had about 6 months clean time since I have started. I enjoy my life. It's hard being an addict... spending all your money on a substance just to feel "okay". It sucks. It is hard. It is not cute. But at the same time, when I am not hurting or chasing.... I am in pure bliss. It's hard to create boundaries for opiates. You can set them. But like a lover, you fall deep and the lines start to get blurry. I wish I could quit.... moreso I wish I had the motivation to quit. Right now, I do not. I am not prepared for that. But I hope to one day be sober with a loved one, no kids, but I'd like to be close to my family again. Since I started using, that is absolutely what I miss most. I miss real love. Not artificial love I snort up my nose.
Definitely ask for it back, theres a big chance she kept it for herself. She seems like the selfish type if she wouldn't offer you a new one when she got herself more, that's rude af

"Heroin is not gonna get you anywere with life. Take oxys or someshit like that" This is the most idiotic thing I have ever read. Oxy is such a slippery slope to heroin use. Please don't be so na #239;ve. Opiate addiction is opiate addiction. Do research on these drugs before suggesting them to other people, PLEASE.
glad it worked! something about the pressure in your head when you plug your ears and swallow really helps!
Yeah you're for sure the only one who hides their weed in weird places.
You said "heroin is not gonna get you anywhere in life." neither is oxy. poor wording choice on your part.

WRITING.TITLE: Shittiest shit post
WRITING.TEXT: My dumbass (who at least has some opana) fucked up and spent practically every dime I have and I'm legit starving. I hate resorting to change hunting and returning cans and bottles. It makes me feel so fucking low and I just hate it. But here I fucking am. Sometimes I hate this life but I know it will never change for me, only get worse. Fuck it. In 5 hours I am doing a little work for my aunt for money and then maybe I can snort an opana and ignore life the rest of the evening. Sorry I sound like such a narcissistic fuck, holy shit. I hope you all have a great day! I'm just hangry. Opana tonight. It's allllll okay. Edit: I changed the word begging.... I do not need to beg my family for money. I asked her if I could help her out with some chores in exchange for 10 or 20 dollars for food, not even dope. Also, this is a rarity, I never do this, so I definitely already feel like complete shit about it.

I explained myself like you did yourself. It's no big deal dude. Glad i understand what you meant now. I read it differently is all and others mighta taken it the same way, but it's all good man... lol

Cops are usually polite to me, but I am a young looking, white female. So of course they are usually somewhat respectful towards me. However, my overall opinion of them is that the good cops will always defend their other LE officers, when an officer abuses their power, it often gets overlooked. And that is a major flaw in our system. Say an officer pulls over a man because he is black, and it's obvious that is why the man was pulled over, most officers are going to defend the officer who pulled the man over whether he is right or wrong and that is the problem I have with police officers. If they stuck up for victims of police brutality more rather than standing with the officers saying it doesn't happen, I would have more faith in them.

If you are going to do this no matter the warnings... with zero tolerance you should be safe to take a whole 5mg pill to start with, and could take another and hour or 2 later but I wouldn't exceed 10mgs your first time so you get a feel for it. And remember this is a stimulant and it'll keep you up so if you plan on sleeping you should take it very early in the day.
I need to start doing that to myself. I thought I had cut down and then all of a sudden my bank account is literally empty all over again. I am such an irresponsible dumb piece of shit sometimes.

Did you read the part where I admitted I was a dumbass because I fucked up on my spending this week and need a little help? Good for you if you've never had to ask family for help with money troubles. A lot of people on this sub have and can relate to me. Edit: I said begging to emphasize the story. I don't need to BEG my family. I offered to help her with some errands and chores in exchange for like 10 fucking dollars.

It wasn't your family's fault either, lmao. Beg is just another word for ask, you're like getting way too deep about this trying to put me down for asking family for help like you've just admitted you've done lol

This is a place where I think a lot of people have been in my position. I felt comfortable sharing my struggles here but I know I also risk being called a junkie piece of shit by posting here as well. It's cool man.
I haven't had to ask for help like this in so long. It honestly feels so fucking terrible. I'm so angry at myself.

Thanks love, you're such a peach. My aunt is having me help her with her lawn work for 15 dollars so I will be getting about 10 ramen cups for the week.... I am going to make it to Friday just fine now! :) thanks for the suggestions!

I've gotten pretty desperate this time around, I've not fucked up and ended up this broke seriously in probably over a year so this feels beyondddd shitty. I am doing lawn work at my aunt's in about an hour so she'll pay me for what I can get done before dark she said! Thankfully someone in my family will still help me out. Desperate times definitely call for desperate measures, luckily I can worth this off until I get paid though! I appreciate the good thoughts, lovely!

You know this post about me. But it's okay. I am fully aware hpw we are stereotypically viewed and that's okay. Good luck with everything dude!

I am 25. I am content. Kids are great for other people but not for me. As an addict, i currently do not have the mental and emotional capacity to care for children and I would never have one hoping it would improve my life... that is the most irresponsible thing i could do to a child. I am 25 but am mentally still a kid myself. That why no kids. A lot of people should never have kids and i am one of them.

WRITING.TITLE: First time trying opana
WRITING.TEXT: Snorted half a 30 ng brown G77. Got the coating off without much issue.... with my tolerance, half a pill was the oerfect dose. I have been super anxious and sad and upset allllll day. But right now, i am on cloud 9 til this ends. Have a beautiful day, guys, rememer that you are loved #10084; Edit: this took like a good 25 minutes to post but i think i spelled shit pretty damn good, all thungs considering! Loo

It is significantly stronger than oxycodone. I take about 120 to 150mgs of oxycodone in a day and about 15 mgs of opana actually has me nodding, athough i did take other opiates today. Also, Opana is oxymorphone. Dilaidid is hydromorphone. So i would put it a step above dilaudid, but I'm not sure this really answers your question. Sorry mam but that's best I can describe it... hope it helps! Edit: forgot a word
If 20ngs of oxy gets you blasted, i would never suggest opana. Super super strong! Keep that toleramce low and enjoy cheap nods dude! #128578;
I havent paid attention so I'm not sure.... this is the first time I've found them and likely won't find them again. Unfortunately lol

I am so sorry you are feeling like this. These thoughtsnare so invasive and hard to ignore.i sympathize with you so much OP. Please stay strong like you have been! You never deserve to feel hurt and pain like that I went through the same tongiht and I went through with it. I couldn'tbelieve after years how quicly it happened. I regret it so much.
